info.name: Beth LLM Chat Service - GraphQL API
info.description: Complete GraphQL API collection for the Beth LLM Chat Service with password-protected conversations and Ollama LLM integration

request.description: Check if the server is running and healthy
Get all public conversations (no password required)
Get a specific public conversation with all its messages

item.name: GraphQL - Get Specific Conversation (Private with Password)

request.description: Get a private conversation using password authentication
Get all messages for a specific conversation (with optional password for private conversations)
Get list of available Ollama models
Create a new private conversation with password protection

item.name: GraphQL - Add User Message (No LLM Response)

request.description: Add a user message to a conversation (no LLM response will be generated)

item.name: GraphQL - Add User Message with LLM Response

request.description: Add a user message and get an LLM response (this will call Ollama)

item.name: GraphQL - Add User Message to Private Conversation

request.description: Add a message to a private conversation using password authentication
Add an LLM message directly (no Ollama call, just store the message)
Verify password for a private conversation
Warm up the Ollama service to reduce initial latency for future LLM calls
